text.div:
VhDir_server

This Capability Statement defines the expected capabilities of a validated healthcare directory FHIR server conforming to the Validated Healthcare Directory Implementation Guide.

ModeSERVER
Description
Transaction
System History
System Searchy
Resource TypeProfileReadV-ReadSearchUpdateCreateUpdatesHistory
Practitionerhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-practitioneryyyyy
PractitionerRolehttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-practitionerroleyyyyy
OrganizationSupported profiles:
  http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-organization
  http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-network		yyyyy
OrganizationAffiliationhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-organizationaffiliationyyyyy
HealthcareServicehttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-healthcareserviceyyyyy
Locationhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-locationyyyyy
CareTeamhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-careteamyyyyy
EndpointSupported profiles:
  http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-endpoint		yyyyy
VerificationResulthttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-validationyyyyy
ConsentSupported profiles:
  http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-restriction
InsurancePlanhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-insuranceplanyyyyy

searchParam.name: qualification-wherevalid-location
searchParam.documentation: Select Practitioners with a qualification that is valid at the specified location

searchParam.documentation: Select Practitioners with the specified name (A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm)
